混合弥漫性光学可能会彻底改变重症监护的血流监测红细胞输血（RBCT）是患有贫血的重症患者的挽救生命治疗，这种情况是人体缺乏足够健康的红细胞来有效递送氧气的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/hybrid-diffuse-optics-could-revolutions-could-blood-flow-flow-monitoring-in-critical-critical-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/hybrid-diffuse-optics-could-revolutions-could-blood-flow-flow-monitoring-in-critical-critical-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2823E318-F7EF-4A56-A337-518FC4892564 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 23:08:33 -0500 Hybrid diffuse optics could revolutionize blood flow monitoring in critical care
